triples.name: Metamorphic testing
triples.relevance: Proposes metamorphic testing as a novel technique to complement special value testing for detecting faults in programs without test oracles.

triples.name: Test oracle
triples.relevance: Addresses the test oracle problem, which is the fundamental challenge of determining correct outputs in software testing.

triples.name: Software testing
triples.relevance: The paper applies metamorphic testing methods to the domain of software testing and program verification.

triples.name: Sine and cosine
triples.relevance: Uses the sine function as a concrete example to demonstrate the effectiveness of metamorphic testing.

triples.name: Search algorithm
triples.relevance: Uses a search function as another practical example to illustrate how metamorphic relationships can detect faults.
